acrobatic.longText: You get a +2 bonus on all Jump checks and Tumble checks.
acrobatic.name: Acrobatic
acrobatic.shortText: +2 Bonus on Jump and Tumble checks

agile.longText: You get a +2 bonus on all Balance checks and Escape Artist checks.
agile.name: Agile
agile.shortText: +2 bonus on Balance and Escape Artist check

alertness.longText: You get a +2 bonus on all Listen checks and Spot checks.
alertness.name: Alertness
alertness.shortText: +2 bonus on Listen and Spot checks

animal affinity.longText: You get a +2 bonus on all Handle Animel checks and Ride checks.
animal affinity.name: Animal Affinity
animal affinity.shortText: +2 bonus on Handle Animal and Ride checks

armor_proficiency_heavy.longText: You are proficient with heavy armor and shields.
armor_proficiency_heavy.name: Armor Proficiency (Heavy)
armor_proficiency_heavy.shortText: No armor check penalty on attack rolls

armor_proficiency_light.longText: You are proficient with light armor.
armor_proficiency_light.name: Armor proficiency (Light)
armor_proficiency_light.shortText: No armor check penalty on attack rolls

armor_proficiency_medium.longText: You are proficient with medium armor.
armor_proficiency_medium.name: Armor Proficiency (Medium)
armor_proficiency_medium.shortText: No armor check penalty on attack rolls

athletic.longText: You get a +2 bonus on all Climb checks and Swim checks.
athletic.name: Athletic
athletic.shortText: +2 bonus on all Climb and Swim checks.

Misc: Summoned creatures get +4 Strength and +4 Constitution

augment_summoning.longText: Each creature you conjure with any summon spell gains a +4 enhancement bonus to Strength and Constitution for the duration of the spell that summoned it
augment_summoning.name: Augment Summoning

Misc: Re-roll miss chance when fighting against an opponent with concealment
invisible attackers do not get bonuses to hit for being invisible
You do not lose your Dexterity bonus against invisible attackers
Take only half penalties to movement speed for being unable to see

blind_fight.longText: In melee, every time you miss because of concealment, you can re-roll your miss chance percentile roll one time to see if you actually hit.  An invisible attacker gets no advantages related to hitting you in melee.  That is, you don't lose your Dexterity bonus to Armor class, and the attacker doesn't get the usual +2 bonus for being invisible.  The invisible attacker's bonuses do still apply for ranged attacks, however.  You take only half the usual penalty to speed for being unable to see.  Darkness and poor visibility in general reduces your speed to 3/4 normal, instead of 1/2.
blind_fight.name: Blind-Fight

Misc: Can brew potions

brew potion.longText: You can create a potion of any 3rd level or lower spell that you know and that targets one or more creatures.  Brewing a potion takes 1 day.  When you create a potion, you set the caster level, which must be sufficient to cast the spell in question and no higher than your own level.
brew potion.name: Brew Potion

Misc: 1 extra attack once a round if you kill a creature

cleave.longText: If you deal a creature enough damage to make it drop, you get an immediate, extra melee attack against another creature within reach.  You can not take a 5-foot step before making this extra attack.  The extra attack is with the same weapon and at the same bonus as the attack that dropped the previous creature.  You can only use this ability once per round.
cleave.name: Cleave
cleave.shortText: Extra melee attack after dropping target

Misc: +4 Concentration when casting defensively
+4 Concentration when casting in a Pin
+4 Concentration when casting in a Grapple

combat casting.longText: You get a +4 on Concentration checks made to cast a spell or use a spell-like ability while on the defensive or while you are grappling or pinned
combat casting.name: Combat Casting
combat casting.shortText: +4 bonus on Concentration checks for defensive casting

Misc: Can trade attack bonus for AC (Max of base attack bonus)

combat expertise.longText: When you use the attack action or the full attack action in melee, you can take a penalty of as much as -5 on your attack roll and add the same number as a dodge bonus to your armor class.  This number may not exceed your base attack bonus.  The changes to attack rolls and armor class last until your next action.
combat expertise.name: Combat Expertise
combat expertise.shortText: Trade attack bonus for AC (Max 5 points)

Misc: Can make more than 1 attack of opportunity per round (up to Dex modifier)
Can make attacks of opportunity while flat footed

combat reflexes.longText: When foes leave themselves open, you may make an number of additional attacks of opportunity equal to your Dexterity bonus.  You may also make attacks of opportunity while flat-footed.
combat reflexes.name: Combat Reflexes

Misc: Can create magic weapons, armors, and shields
Can repair magic weapons, armors, and shields

craft magic arms and armor.longText: You can create any magic weapon, armor, or shield whose prerequisites you meet.  You can also mend a broken magic weapon, suit of armor or shield if it is one that you could make.
craft magic arms and armor.name: Craft Magic Arms and Armor
craft magic arms and armor.shortText: Create magic weapons, armor, and shields

Misc: Can create magic rods

craft rod.longText: You can create any rod whose prerequisites you meet.
craft rod.name: Craft Rod

Misc: Can create magic staffs

craft staff.longText: You can create any staff whose prerequisites you meet.
craft staff.name: Craft Staff

Misc: Can create magic wands

craft wand.longText: You can create any wand of any 4th level or lower spell that you know.
craft wand.name: Craft Wand

Misc: Can create wondrous items

craft_wondrous_item.longText: You can create any wondrous item whose prerequisites you meet.  You can also mend a broken wondrous item if it is one that you could make.
craft_wondrous_item.name: Craft Wondrous Item

deceitful.longText: You get a +2 bonus on all Disguise checks and Forgery checks.
deceitful.name: Deceitful
deceitful.shortText: +2 bonus on Disguise and Forgery checks

Misc: Once per round, you may deflect 1 ranged melee attack (non-magical attack) that you know of

deflect arrows.longText: You must have at least 1 hand free to use this feat.  once per round when you would normally be hit with a ranged weapon, you may deflect it so that you take no damage from it.  You must be aware of the attack and not flat footed.  Attempting to deflect a ranged weapon doesn't count as an action.  Unusually massive ranged weapons or range attacks generated by spell effects can't be deflected.
deflect arrows.name: Deflect Arrows

deft hands.longText: You get a +2 bonus on all Sleight of Hand checks and Use Rope checks.
deft hands.name: Deft Hands
deft hands.shortText: +2 bonus on all Sleight of Hand and Use Rope checks

Misc: You automatically become stable when reduced to between -1 and -9 Hit points
You act as disabled instead of dying when between -1 and -9 Hit points

diehard.longText: When reduced to between -1 and -9 hit points, you automatically become stable.  You don't have to roll d% to see if you lose 1 hit point each round.  When reduced to negative hit points, you may choose to act as if you were disabled, rather than dying.  you must make this decision as soon as you are reduced to negative hit points (even if it isn't your turn). If you do not choose to act as if you were disabled, you immediately fall unconscious.
diehard.name: Diehard

diligent.longText: You get a +2 bonus on all Appraise checks and Decipher Script checks.
diligent.name: Diligent
diligent.shortText: +2 bonus on Appraise and Decipher Script checks

Misc: +1 dodge bonus to AC against 1 selected target

dodge.longText: During you action, you designate an opponent and receive a +1 dodge bonus to Armor Class against attacks from that opponent.  You can select a new opponent on any action.  A condition that makes you lose your Dexterity bonus to Armor Class (if any) also makes you lose dodge bonuses.  Also dodge bonuses stack with each other, unlike most other types of bonuses
dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.shortText: +1 dodge bonus to AC against selected target

Misc: increase a spells variables by 50%, this spell takes up a spell slot 2 levels higher

empower spell.longText: All variable, numeric effects of an empowered spell are increased by 1/2.  An empowered spell deals half again as much damage as normal, cures half again as many hit points, affects half again as many targets, and so forth as appropriate.  Saving throws and opposed rolls are not affects, nor are spells with out random variables.  An empowered spell uses up a spell slot two levels higher than the spell's actual level.
empower spell.name: Empower Spell
empower spell.shortText: Increase spell's variable, numeric effects by 50%

Misc: +4 on swim checks to resist non-lethal damage
+4 on Constitution checks to continue running
+4 on Constitution checks to avoid non-lethal damage from forced marches
+4 on Constitution checks to hold your breath
+4 on Constitution checks to avoid non-lethal damage from starvation or thirst
+4 on Fortitude saves to avoid non-lethal damage from hot or cold environments
+4 on Fortitude saves to resist damage from suffocation

endurance.longText: You gain a +4 bonus on following checks and saves: swim checks made to resist non-lethal damage, Constitution checks made to continue running, Constitution checks made to avoid non-lethal damage from a forced march, Constitution checks made to hold your breath, Constitution checks made to avoid non-lethal damage from starvation or thirst.  Fortitude saves made to avoid non-lethal damage from hot or cold environments and fortitude saves made to resist damage from suffocation.  Also you may sleep in light or medium armor with out becoming fatigued.
endurance.name: Endurance
endurance.shortText: +4 bonus on checks or saves to resist non-lethal damage

Misc: Cast a spell at double its normal range, this spell takes up 1 spell slot higher

enlarge spell.longText: You can alter a spell with a range of close, medium or long to increase it's range by 100%.  An enlarged spell with a range of close now has a range of 50ft + 5ft/level, while medium-range spells have a range of 200ft + 20ft/level and long-range spells have a range of 800ft + 80ft/level.  An enlarged spell uses up a spell slot one level higher than the spell's actual level.  Spells whose ranges are not defined by distance, as well as spells whose ranges are not close, medium, or long, do not have increased ranges.
enlarge spell.name: Enlarge Spell

Misc: Cast spells with out having the spell components if its cost is under 1 gold

eschew materials.longText: You can cast any spell that has a material component costing 1 gp or less without needing that component.  (The casting of the spell still provokes attacks of opportunity as normal.)  If the spell requires a material component that costs more than 1 gp, you must have the material component at hand to cast the spell, just as normal.
eschew materials.name: Eschew Materials

exotic_weapon_proficiency.longText: You make attack rolls with the weapon normally
exotic_weapon_proficiency.name: Exotic Weapon Proficiency
exotic_weapon_proficiency.shortText: No penalty on attacks with specific exotic weapon

Misc: cast a spell that lasts twice as long, this spell takes up a spell slot 1 level higher

extend spell.longText: An extended spell lasts twice as long as normal.  A spell with a duration or concentration, instantaneous, or permanent is not affected by this feat.  An extended spell uses up a spell slot 1 level higher than the spell's actual level.
extend spell.name: Extend Spell

extra turning.longText: Each time you take this feat, you can use your ability to turn or rebuke creatures four more times per day as normal.
extra turning.name: Extra Turning
extra turning.shortText: Can turn or rebuke 4 more times per day

Misc: Increase projectile weapons range by 1/2
Double thrown weapon range

far shot.longText: When you use a projectile weapon, it's range increment increases by 1/2.  when you use a thrown weapon, it's range increment is doubled.
far shot.name: Far Shot

Misc: Can create magic rings

forge ring.longText: You can create any ring whose prerequisites you meet, You can also mend a broken ring if it is one that you could make.
forge ring.name: Forge Ring

Misc: You have no limit to the number of times you can cleave

great cleave.longText: This feat works like Cleave, except that there is no limit to the number of times you can use it per round.
great cleave.name: Great Cleave
great cleave.shortText: No limit to cleave attacks each round

greater_spell_focus.longText: Add +1 to the Difficulty Class for all saving throws against spells from the school of magic you select.  This stacks with the bonus from Spell Focus.
greater_spell_focus.name: Greater Spell Focus
greater_spell_focus.shortText: +2 bonus on save DCs against specific school of magic

Misc: +2 bonus to overcome enemy spell resistance

greater_spell_penetration.longText: You get a +2 bonus on caster level checks made to overcome a creatures spell resistance.  This bonus stacks with the one from Spell penetration
greater_spell_penetration.name: Greater Spell Penetration
greater_spell_penetration.shortText: +2 bonus on caster level checks to defeat spell resistance

greater_two_weapon_fighting.longText: you get a third attack with your off-hand weapon, albeit at a -10 penalty.
greater_two_weapon_fighting.name: Greater Two-Weapon Fighting

greater_weapon_focus.longText: You gain a +1 bonus on all attack rolls you make using the selected weapon.  This bonus stacks with other bonuses on attack rolls, including the one from Weapon Focus.
greater_weapon_focus.name: Greater Weapon Focus
greater_weapon_focus.shortText: +1 bonus on attack rolls with selected weapon

greater_weapon_specialization.longText: You gain a +2 bonus on all damage rolls you make using the selected weapon.  This bonus stacks with other bonuses on damage rolls, including the one from Weapon Specialization.
greater_weapon_specialization.name: Greater Weapon Specialization
greater_weapon_specialization.shortText: +2 bonus on damage rolls with selected weapon

Misc: Cast a spell at a higher level than normal. increasing the DC and spell level dependants

heighten spell.longText: A heightened spell has a higher spell level than normal (Up to a maximum of 9th level).  Unlike other metamagic feats, Heighten spell actually increases the effective level of the spell that it modifies.  All effects dependent on spell level (Such as saving throw DCs and ability to penetrate a lesser glove of invulnerability) are calculated according to the heightened level.  The heightened spell is as difficult to prepare and cast as a spell of its effective level.
heighten spell.name: Heighten Spell
heighten spell.shortText: Cast a spell as a higher level

Misc: Counter spelling can be done with a spell that is at least 1 level higher of countering spell and of the same school

improved counterspell.longText: When counterspelling, you may use a spell of the same school that is one or more spell levels higher than the target spell.
improved counterspell.name: Improved Counterspell
improved counterspell.shortText: Counterspell with spell of the same school

improved critical.longText: When using the weapon you selected, your threat range is doubled.  This effect doesn't with any other effect that expand the threat range of a weapon.
improved critical.name: Improved Critical

Misc: Disarm attempts do not provoke attacks of opportunity
Opponents do not get disarm attempts when you fall on disarming

improved disarm.longText: You do not provoke attack of opportunity when you attempt to disarm an opponent, nor does the opponent have a chance to disarm you.  You also get a +4 bonus on opposed attack roll you make to disarm you opponent.
improved disarm.name: Improved Disarm
improved disarm.shortText: +4 bonus on bull rush attempts; no attack of opportunity

Misc: You can make bluff checks in combat as a move action

improved feint.longText: You can make a bluff check to feint in combat as a move action.
improved feint.name: Improved Feint
improved feint.shortText: Feint in combat as move action

Misc: Grapple attempts do not provoke attacks of opportunity

improved grapple.longText: You do not provoke an attack of opportunity when you make a touch attack to start a grapple.  You also gain a +4 bonus on all grapple checks, regardless of whether you started the grapple.
improved grapple.name: Improved Grapple
improved grapple.shortText: +4 on grapple checks; no attack of opportunity

improved initiative.longText: You get a +4 bonus on initiative checks.
improved initiative.name: Improved Initiative

Misc: Opponents may not choose to avoid your overrun attempts
Overrun do not provoke attacks of opportunity

improved overrun.longText: When you attempt to overrun an opponent, the target may not choose to avoid you.  You also gain a +4 bonus on your Strength check to knock down your opponent.
improved overrun.name: Improved Overrun
improved overrun.shortText: +4 bonus on overrun attempts; no attack of opportunity

Misc: Sunder attempts do not provoke attacks of opportunity

improved sunder.longText: When you Strike at an object held or carried by an opponent, you do not provoke an attack of opportunity.  You also gain a +4 bonus on any attack roll made to attack an object held or carried by another character.
improved sunder.name: Improved Sunder
improved sunder.shortText: +4 bonus on sunder attempts; no attack of opportunity

Misc: Free attack against successfully tripped opponent
Trip attempts do not provoke attack of opportunity

improved trip.longText: You do not provoke an of opportunity when you attempt to trip an opponent while you are unarmed.  You also get a +4 bonus on your Strength checks to trip your opponent.  If you trip an opponent in melee combat, you immediately get a melee attack against that opponent as if you hadn't used your attack for the trip attempt.
improved trip.name: Improved Trip
improved trip.shortText: +4 bonus on trip attempts; no attack of opportunity

improved turning.longText: You turn or rebuke creatures as if you were one level higher than you are in the class that grants you the ability.
improved turning.name: Improved Turning

Misc: Bull rushes do not provoke attacks of opportunity

improved_bull_rush.longText: When you perform a bull rush, you do not provoke an attack of opportunity from the defender.  You also gain a +4 bonus on the opposed Strength check you make to push back the defender.
improved_bull_rush.name: Improved Bull Rush
improved_bull_rush.shortText: +4 bonus on bull rush attempts; no attack of opportunity

Misc: Ranged attacks ignore AC bonus from anything less than total cover
Ranged attacks ignore miss chance from anything less than total concealment
Automatically hit against selected target in a grapple

improved_precise_shot.longText: Your ranged attacks ignore the AC bonus granted to targets by anything less than total cover, and the miss chance granted to targets by anything less than total concealment.  Total cover and total concealment provide their normal benefits against your ranged attacks.  In addition, when you shoot or throw ranged weapons at a grappling opponent, you automatically Strike at the opponent you have chosen.
improved_precise_shot.name: Improved Precise Shot
improved_precise_shot.shortText: Ignore less than total than total cover/concealment on ranged attacks

Misc: Retain shield bonus to AC when shield bashing

improved_shield_bash.longText: When you perform a shield bash, you may still apply the shield's shield bonus to your AC
improved_shield_bash.name: Improved Shield Bash
improved_shield_bash.shortText: Retain shield bonus to AC when shield bashing

improved_two_weapon_fighting.longText: In addition to the standard single extra attack you get with an off-hand weapon, you get a second attack with it, albeit at a -5 penalty.
improved_two_weapon_fighting.name: Improved Two-Weapon Fighting

Misc: Unarmed attacks do not provoke attacks of opportunity
Unarmed Strikes can deal lethal or non-lethal damage

improved_unarmed_strike.longText: You are considered to be armed even when unarmed - that is, you do not provoke attacks of opportunity from armed opponents when you attack them while unarmed.  In addition, your unarmed Strikes can deal lethal or non-lethal damage, at your option.
improved_unarmed_strike.name: Improved Unarmed Strike

investigator.longText: You get a +2 bonus on all Gather Information checks and Search checks
investigator.name: Investigator
investigator.shortText: +2 bonus on Gather Information and Search checks

iron will.longText: You get a +2 bonus on all will saving throws.
iron will.name: Iron Will

Misc: You gain a cohort and followers

leadership.longText: You can attract loyal companions and devoted followers, subordinates who assist you.  Your DM has information on what sort of cohort and how many followers you can recruit.
leadership.name: Leadership

lightning reflexes.longText: You get a +2 bonus on all reflex saving throws.
lightning reflexes.name: Lightning Reflexes

magical aptitude.longText: You get a +2 bonus on all Spellcraft checks and Use Magic Device checks.
magical aptitude.name: Magical Aptitude
magical aptitude.shortText: +2 bonus on Spellcraft and Use Magic Device checks

Ability: Attack option (fire 2 arrows + 1 per 5 extra BAB above 6)(BAB + Dex mod - 4)(range 30)

manyshot.longText: As a standard action, you may fire two arrows at a single opponent within 30 feet.  Both arrows use the same attack roll (with a -4 penalty) to determine success and deal damage normally.  For every five points of base attack bonus you have above +6, you may add one additional arrow to this attack, to a maximum of four arrows at a base attack bonus of +16.  However, each arrow after the second adds a cumulative -2 penalty on the attack roll.  Damage reduction and other resistances apply separately against each arrow fired.
manyshot.name: Manyshot

martial_weapon_proficiency.longText: You make attack rolls with the selected weapon normally
martial_weapon_proficiency.name: Martial Weapon Proficiency
martial_weapon_proficiency.shortText: No penalty on attacks with specific martial weapon

Misc: Cast a spell with all variable components maximized, this spell takes up a spell slot 3 levels higher

maximize spell.longText: All variable, numeric effects of a spell modified by this feat are maximized.  A maximized spell deals maximum damage, cures the maximum number of hit points, affects the maximum number of targets, etc., as appropriate. Saving throws and opposed rolls are not affected, nor are spells without random variables.  A maximized spell takes up a spell slot three levels higher than the spell's actual level.
maximize spell.name: Maximize Spell

Misc: +4 dodge bonus to attacks of opportunity when moving through threatened areas

mobility.longText: You get a +4 dodge bonus to Armor Class against attacks of opportunity caused when you move out of or within a threatened area.  A condition that makes you lose your Dexterity bonus to Armor Class (if any) also makes you lose dodge bonuses.  Dodge bonuses stack with each other.
mobility.name: Mobility
mobility.shortText: +4 dodge bonus to AC against some attacks of opportunity

Misc: half the penalties when using ranged weapons while mounted

mounted archery.longText: The penalty you take when using a ranged weapon while mounted is halved.
mounted archery.name: Mounted Archery
mounted archery.shortText: Half penalty for ranged attacks while mounted

Misc: As a prepared action, you can make a ride check to negate one known attack

mounted combat.longText: Once per round when your mount is hit in combat, you may attempt a Ride checks (as a reaction) to negate the hit.  The not is negated if your Ride check result is greater than the opponent's attack roll.
mounted combat.name: Mounted Combat
mounted combat.shortText: Negate hits on mount with Ride checks

Misc: Verbal and Somatic components can be completed while in wild shape.

natural spell.longText: You can complete the verbal and somatic components of spells while in a wild shape.  This feat does not permit the use of magic items while you are in a form that could not ordinarily use them, and you do not gain the ability to speak while in a wild shape.
natural spell.name: Natural Spell
natural spell.shortText: Cast spells while in wild shape

negotiator.longText: You get a +2 bonus on all Diplomacy checks and Sense Motive checks.
negotiator.name: Negotiator
negotiator.shortText: +2 bonus on Diplomacy and Sense Motive checks

nimble fingers.longText: You get a +2 bonus on all Disable Device checks and Open Lock checks.
nimble fingers.name: Nimble Fingers
nimble fingers.shortText: +2 bonus on Disable Device and Open Lock checks

persuasive.longText: You get a +2 bonus on all Bluff checks and Intimidate checks.
persuasive.name: Persuasive
persuasive.shortText: +2 bonus on Bluff checks and Intimidate checks

Misc: Attacks rolls made with ranged weapons less than 30 feet away from a target get +1 to attack and damage rolls

point_blank_shot.longText: You get a +1 bonus on attack and damage rolls with ranged weapons at ranges of up to 30 feet.
point_blank_shot.name: Point Blank Shot
point_blank_shot.shortText: +1 bonus on ranged attack and damage within 30ft

Ability: Option Power attack (- base attack x) (+ damage x)

power attack.longText: On your action, before making attack rolls for a round, you may choose to subtract a number of from all melee attacks and add the same number to all melee damage rolls.  This may not exceed your base attack bonus.  The penalty on attacks and bonus on damage apply until your next turn.
power attack.name: Power Attack
power attack.shortText: Trade attack bonus for damage (up to base attack bonus)

Misc: No ranged penalty on opponents in melee combat

precise shot.longText: You can shoot or throw ranged weapons at an opponent engaged in melee without taking the standard -4 penalty to your attack roll.
precise shot.name: Precise Shot
precise shot.shortText: No -4 penalty for shooting into melee

Misc: Draw weapons as a free actions
Draw hidden weapons as a move action
throw weapons at normal rate for ranged weapons

quick draw.longText: You can draw a weapon as a free action instead of a move action. You can draw a hidden weapon as a move action.  A character who has selected this feat may throw weapons at his full normal rate of attacks
quick draw.name: Quick Draw

Misc: Cast a spell as a free action (spell can not have a casting time higher than a standard action, this spell does not provoke attacks of opportunity), this spells takes up a spell slot four levels higher than normal

quicken spell.longText: Casting a quickened spell is a free action.  You can perform another action, even casting another spell, in the same turn as you cast a quickened spell.  You may cast only one quickened spell per round.   A spell whose casting time is more than 1 full round action can not be quickened.  A quickened spell uses up spell slot four levels higher than the spell's actual level.  Casting a quickened spell doesn't provoke an attack of opportunity
quicken spell.name: Quicken Spell
quicken spell.shortText: Cast spells as a free action

Ability: (Crossbow type: hand) weapon hand crossbow reload (free action)
(Crossbow type: light) weapon light crossbow reload (free action)
(Crossbow type: heavy) weapon heavy crossbow reload (move action)

rapid reload.longText: The time required for you to reload your chosen type of crossbow is reduced to a free action (if it is a hand or light crossbow) or a move action (if it is a heavy crossbow).  Reloading a crossbow still provokes an attack of opportunity.  If you have selected this feat for hand crossbow or light crossbow, You may fire that weapon as many times in a full attack action as you could attack if you were using a bow.
rapid reload.name: Rapid Reload

Ability: Attack Option (Full Attack +1) (Base attack bonus - 2) (extra attack)

rapid shot.longText: You can get one extra attack per round with a ranged weapon.  The attack is at your highest base attack bonus, but each attack you make in that round takes a -2 penalty.  You must use the full attack action to use this feat.
rapid shot.name: Rapid Shot
rapid shot.shortText: One extra ranged attack each round

Misc: You may move in a mounted charge, attack then move again
Mounted charges do not provoke attacks of opportunity from target enemy

ride_by_attack.longText: When you are mounted and use the charge action, you may move and attack as if with a standard charge and then move again.  Your total movement for the round can't exceed double your mounted speed.  You and your mount do not provoke an attack of opportunity from the opponent that you attack
ride_by_attack.name: Ride-By Attack
ride_by_attack.shortText: Move before and after a mounted charge

Misc: Retain Dexterity bonus to AC while running
+4 bonus on jump checks made with a running start

run.longText: When running, you move five times your normal speed (if wearing medium, light, or no armor and carrying nomore than a medium load)  If you make a jump after a running start, you gain a +4 bonus on your jump check.  While running you retain your Dexterity bonus to AC.
run.name: Run
run.shortText: Run at 5 times normal speed, +4 on jump checks made after a running start

Misc: Can create magic scrolls

scribe scroll.longText: You can create a scroll of any spell that you know.
scribe scroll.name: Scribe Scroll

self_sufficient.longText: You get a +2 bonus on all Heal checks and Survival checks.
self_sufficient.name: Self-Sufficient
self_sufficient.shortText: +2 bonus on heal and survival checks

shield proficiency.longText: You can use shields and only take the standard penalties
shield proficiency.name: Shield Proficiency
shield proficiency.shortText: No armor check penalty on attack rolls

Misc: Move before and after an attack with a ranged weapon, distance can not exceed your total speed

shot_on_the_run.longText: When using the attack action with a ranged weapon, you can split your move action in that round in order to move both before and after the attack, provided that your total distance moved is not greater than your speed.
shot_on_the_run.name: Shot On The Run
shot_on_the_run.shortText: Move before and after ranged attack

Misc: Remove the verbal component from a spell, this spell takes up a spell slot higher than normal

silent spell.longText: A silent spell can be cast with no verbal components.  Spells without verbal components are not affected.  A silent spell uses a spell slot one level higher than the spell's actual level.  Bard spells cannot be enhanced by this metamagic feat.
silent spell.name: Silent Spell

simple_weapon_proficiency.longText: You make attack rolls with simple weapons normally
simple_weapon_proficiency.name: Simple Weapon Proficiency
simple_weapon_proficiency.shortText: No -4 penalties on attack rolls with simple weapons

skill focus.longText: You get a +3 bonus on all checks involving that skill
skill focus.name: Skill Focus
skill focus.shortText: +3 bonus on checks with selected skill

Misc: Once per round, you may catch 1 ranged melee attack (non-magical attack) that you know of
You may immediately attack with a thrown weapon caught with the Snatch Arrows feat

snatch arrows.longText: When using the deflect arrows feat, you may catch the weapon instead of just deflecting it.  Thrown weapons such as spears or axes, can immediately be thrown back at the original attacker (even though it isn't your turn) or kept for later use.  You must have at least one hand free to use this feat.
snatch arrows.name: Snatch Arrows

spell focus.longText: Add +1 to the difficulty class for all saving throws against spells from the school of magic you select.
spell focus.name: Spell Focus
spell focus.shortText: +1 bonus on save DCs against specific school of magic

Misc: You can prepare selected spells with out the need of a spell book

spell mastery.longText: Each time you take this feat, choose a number of spells equal to your Intelligence modifier that you already know.  From that point on you can prepare these spells without referring to a spellbook.
spell mastery.name: Spell Mastery
spell mastery.shortText: Can prepare some spells without spellbook

spell penetration.longText: You get a +2 bonus on caster level checks made to overcome a creature's spell resistance.
spell penetration.name: Spell Penetration
spell penetration.shortText: +2 bonus on caster level checks to defeat spell resistance

Ability: Modify (Attack Option) (Mounted Charge) : (Weapon : Lance) (damage modifier x 3)

spirited charge.longText: When mounted and using the charge action, you deal double damage with a melee weapon (or Triple damage with a lance)
spirited charge.name: Spirited Charge

Misc: You can move before and after a melee attack, this does not provoke attacks of opportunity from your target, the distance covered during movement can not exceed your maximum move speed

spring attack.longText: When using the attack action with a melee weapon, you can split your move action in that round in order to move before and after the attack, provided that your total distance moved is not greater than your speed.  Moving in this way does not provoke an attack of opportunity from the defender you attack, though it might provoke attacks of opportunity from other creatures, if appropriate.  You can't use this feat if you are wearing heavy armor.  You must move at least 5 feet both before and after you make your attack in order to utilize the benefits of Spring attack.
spring attack.name: Spring Attack
spring attack.shortText: Move before and after melee attack

stealthy.longText: You get a +2 bonus on all Hide Checks and Move Silently checks.
stealthy.name: Stealthy
stealthy.shortText: +2 bonus on Hide and Move Silently checks

Misc: Remove the somatic component from a spell, This spell takes up a spell slot higher than normal

still spell.longText: A still spell can be cast with no somatic components.  Spells without somatic components are not affected.  A stilled spell uses up a spell slot one level higher than the spell's actual level.
still spell.name: Still Spell

Ability: New (Attack Option) (Stunning Fist) : (Damage : unarmed) (DC : 10 + .5 character level + Wisdom modifier) (Times per day : 1 per 4 character levels)

stunning fist.longText: You must declare that you are using this feat before you make your attack roll.  Stunning First forces a foe damaged by your unarmed attack to make a fortitude saving throw, in addition to dealing damage normally.  A defender who fails this saving throw is stunned for 1 round (until just before your next action).  A stunned character can't act, drops anything held, loses any Dexterity bonus to AC, and takes a -2 penalty to AC.  You may attempt a stunning attack once per day for every 4 levels you have attained, and no more than once per round.  ConStructs, oozes, plants, undead, incorporeal creatures, and creatures immune to critical hits cannot be stunned.
stunning fist.name: Stunning Fist

tower_shield_proficiency.longText: You can use a tower shield and suffer only the standard penalties
tower_shield_proficiency.name: Tower Shield Proficiency
tower_shield_proficiency.shortText: No armor check penalty on attack rolls

Misc: Can track movements with the survival skill

track.longText: To find tracks or to follow them for 1 mile requires a successful survival check.  You must make another survival check every time the tracks before difficult to follow, such as when other tracks cross them or when the tracks backtrack and diverge.  You move at half your normal speed (or at your normal speed with a -5 penalty on the check, or at up to twice your normal speed with a -20 penalty on the check).  The DC depends on the surface and the prevailing conditions.  If you fail a survival check, you can retry after 1 hour (outdoors) or 10 minutes (indoors) of searching.
track.name: Track

trample.longText: When you attempt to overrun an opponent while mounted, your target may not choose to avoid you.  Your mount may make one hoof attack against any target you knock down, gaining the standard +4 bonus on attack rolls against prone targets.
trample.name: Trample

Misc: While wielding a double weapon or two weapons, gain a +1 shield bonus to AC

two_weapon_defense.longText: When wielding a double weapon or two weapons (not including natural weapons or unarmed Strikes), you gain a +1 shield bonus to your AC.
two_weapon_defense.name: Two-Weapon Defense
two_weapon_defense.shortText: Off hand weapon grants +1 shield bonus to AC

Ability: Attack (Light Weapons) : (- Strength modifier ) (+ Dexterity modifier) (- Shield armor check penalty)
Attack (Rapier) : (- Strength modifier ) (+ Dexterity modifier) (- Shield armor check penalty)
Attack (Whip) : (- Strength modifier ) (+ Dexterity modifier) (- Shield armor check penalty)
Attack (Spike Chain) : (- Strength modifier ) (+ Dexterity modifier) (- Shield armor check penalty)

weapon finesse.longText: With a light weapon, rapier, whip, or spiked chain made for a creature of your size category, you may use your Dexterity modifier instead of your Strength modifier on attack rolls,  If you carry a shield, its armor check penalty applies to your attack rolls.
weapon finesse.name: Weapon Finesse
weapon finesse.shortText: Use Dex modifier instead of Str modifier on attack rolls with light melee weapon

weapon focus.longText: You gain a +1 bonus on all attack rolls you make using the selected weapon.
weapon focus.name: Weapon Focus
weapon focus.shortText: +1 bonus on attack rolls with selected weapon

weapon specialization.longText: You gain a +2 bonus on all damage rolls you make using the selected weapon.
weapon specialization.name: Weapon Specialization
weapon specialization.shortText: +2 bonus on damage rolls with selected weapon

Ability: New (Attack Option) (Whirlwind) : (Desc : hit everyone within reach once with your weapon)

whirlwind attack.longText: When you use the full attack action, you can give up your regular attacks and instead make one melee attack at your full base attack bonus against each opponent with in reach.  When you use the whirlwind attack feat, you also forfeit any bonus or extra attacks granted by other feats or abilities.
whirlwind attack.name: Whirlwind Attack
whirlwind attack.shortText: One melee attack against each opponent within reach

Misc: Cast a spell with it's area covered doubled.  this spell takes up a spell slot 3 levels higher than normal

widen spell.longText: You can alter a burst, emanation, line, or spread shaped spell to increase its area.  Any numeric measurements of the spell's area increase by 100%.  A widened spell uses up a spell slot three levels higher than the spell's actual level.  Spells that do not have an area of one of these four sorts are not affected by this feat.
widen spell.name: Widen Spell
